subject: Career
title: Measuring Brand Impact
description: Learn Measuring Brand Impact in one minute.

hook.text: She posts thought leadership weekly. But is it working? Without measurement, branding is just hope.

buildup.text: Brand impact can be measured through leading indicators: inbound opportunities, speaking invitations, referrals.

discovery.text: Track 'brand signals': how often do people reach out to you? What do they associate you with?

twist.text: Follower count is vanity. Inbound opportunities and referrals are the real metrics of brand strength.

climax.text: Ask three trusted contacts: 'What do you think of when you think of me professionally?' Their answers are your brand.

punchline.text: Your brand is what people say when you're not in the room. Measure that.

quiz.question: What is the best way to measure personal brand impact?
options: Inbound opportunities, referrals, and what people associate you with
